text:
Apple broke up bullishly from an inside bar pattern & has been working to erase the losses caused when Apple printed a Q4 revenue miss on 28-Oct, which caused the stock to fall about 4% the following day before rebounding. Apple was trading at about $148, but by late morning the stock had already soared up about 1.5% higher over the $150 level
